core_meaning: Sextile between Saturn and Neptune opens opportunity/skill. Saturn: discipline, structure, time, limits, dharma via effort. Neptune: . General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

facets.career: Authority via mastery, long-term credibility.  Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.relationships: Commitment realism, boundaries, duty.  Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.money: Slow steady accrual, austerity, debt realism.  Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.health_adj: Bones, teeth, chronic load; routines & posture.  Emphasis: opportunity/skill.

risk_notes: Complacency or overextension; assuming goodwill covers weak execution.
Burnout via over-responsibility; schedule recovery windows.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Saturn: structure, commit, audit; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Saturn: structure, commit, audit; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Saturn: structure, commit, audit; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Saturn: structure, commit, audit; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Saturn: structure, commit, audit; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Saturn: structure, commit, audit; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

en.title: Saturn Sextile Neptune
en.core: Sextile between Saturn and Neptune opens opportunity/skill. Saturn: discipline, structure, time, limits, dharma via effort. Neptune: . General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

hi.title: Saturn Sextile Neptune (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Saturn और Neptune का Sextile — ऊर्जा opportunity/skill के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
